definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: utterance, speech, word (poet., mostly sg. coll., cf. pl. vb. Ps 119:103, but here rd. prob. Pl.n. cf. LXX Ol Hi De Che)—cstr. [[אִמְרַת]] Is 5:24 +; [[אִמְרָתִי]] Ge 4:23 + etc.; Pl. abs. [[אֲמָרוֹת]] Ps 12:7; cstr. [[אִמֲרוֹת]] ib.;—utterance, speech Ge 4:23 (song of Lamech, ‖[[קוֹל]]); so Is 28:23, Is 32:9; De 32:2 (‖[[לֶקַח]]), Ps 17:9, Is 29:4, Is 29:4 (‖ also [[דִּבֶּד]]); esp. saying(s), words(s) of ´[[י]] (command & promise) De 33:9 (‖[[בְּרִית]]); Is 5:24 (‖[[תּוֹרָה]]) 2Sa 22:31 = Ps 18:31, Ps 12:7, Ps 105:19 (‖[[דָּבָר]]; esp Ps 119:11, Ps 119:38, Ps 119:41 + 16 t.; Ps 138:2, Ps 147:15 (‖[[דָּבָר]]), Pr 30:5.
